Description: Funerary papyrus of Pakharenkhons; sheet 1(five fragments); Hieratic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by F. Herbin, Late Religious Texts. 2 The Beatifications are published in J. Assmann et al. Altaegyptische Totenliturgien III Osirisliturgien in Papyri derSpaetzeit (Heidelberg 2008).
